mapper.select: WITH P_MPID AS ( SELECT MPID.COMPANY_CD , MPID.DIVISION_CD , MPID.INOUT_NO AS RETURN_NO , MPID.SEQ , MPID.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID AS RETURN_REFERENCE_NO , MPID.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPID.UNIT_PRICE , MPID.AMOUNT , MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MPID.INOUT_QTY AS RETURN_REQUEST_QTY , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID AS RETURN_INOUT_ID , MPID.DESCRIPTION , (SELECT MOM_STOCK_PKG.FN_GET_PREV_INOUT_SUM_QTY(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID) FROM DUAL) AS RETURN_QTY FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPID , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPID.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.INOUT_NO = #{inoutNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.DIVISION_CD , A.RETURN_NO , A.SEQ , A.RETURN_REFERENCE_NO , A.ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_SPEC , A.ITEM_TYPE , A.ITEM_TYPE_NM , MII.INOUT_UNIT AS GR_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD, MII.DIVISION_CD, MII.INOUT_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS GR_UNIT_NM , MII.INOUT_QTY AS GR_QTY , A.RETURN_QTY , MII.INOUT_QTY - NVL(A.RETURN_QTY, 0) AS REMAIN_QTY , A.RETURN_REQUEST_QTY , A.UNIT_PRICE , A.AMOUNT , A.LOCAL_AMOUNT , A.RETURN_INOUT_ID , A.DESCRIPTION , ROWIDTOCHAR(A.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM P_MPID A , MOM_ITEM_INOUT MII WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = MII.COMPANY_CD AND A.DIVISION_CD = MII.DIVISION_CD AND A.RETURN_REFERENCE_NO = MII.ITEM_INOUT_ID ORDER BY A.RETURN_NO , A.SEQ
